title: Science Education Design for Strengthening Multicultural Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A mixed-methods (survey and interview) program for science field employees to strengthen multicultural education competency (MTC).

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their own competency levels using multicultural education competency (MTC) assessment tools.
Learners can design three multicultural education strategies applicable to science curricula.
Learners can identify two or more barriers in multicultural education implementation and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
